_sText:
Fy_iceworld_remake_2009
----------------------------------------


info:
----------------------------------------

fist of all, i know that the whole iceworld idea is based on snowy textures and its supposed to be a snowy map, but, since the idea is equal to the remake i cant really change the name of it, all i can do is change the textures i guess.

remakes done:
----------------------------------------

-brighter light
-water in the center of the map with an awp to make more fair gameplay
-added a (start constrained) to all the weapons to make them look a bit nicer, also added ammo to all the weapons.
-an easter egg
-custom skybox
-glas windows, made the map completely indoor

credits:
----------------------------------------

-myself for making the map
-g-flow for the skybox
-the original creator of iceworld


please enjoy it! -junior
